title: Hospitality Practical Skills Enhancement: MOOC Learning Culture Exploration Through Virtual Ethnographic Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning experience and intermediate-level knowledge in social sciences/science fields
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can identify six major learning culture themes observed in MOOC environments.
Learners can analyze interaction patterns among peer learners using virtual ethnographic tools.
Learners can apply the core principles of the MOOC learning culture model, "MOOCocracy," to scientific fields.
Learners can evaluate knowledge-sharing mechanisms formed in LMS-based asynchronous discussions.
Learners can explain the impact of cultural diversity among global learner groups on learning outcomes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
